Original:
西門少有的精釀啤酒吧，位於中華路與峨眉街交口附近，有多樣獨家精釀啤酒，包括：嗨啤5%、長島冰啤、美式IPA、小滿/冬瓜茶啤酒、芒種/芭芒柳水果啤酒、春分/梅子啤酒，以及伏特加、琴酒、威士忌等各式調酒。
店內乾淨整潔，位於步行區街邊，氣氛悠閒，服務人員具備英語能力，能接待外國遊客，消費平實，且可自帶外食。周邊就有台味十足的碳烤店、鹹酥雞店，也有軟性飲料，是在西門町逛街逛累時，暫時歇腳的好去處。
LGBT友善、寵物友善、親子友善，老闆娘外語能力強，親切熱情，喜歡交朋友，就算一個人也能很輕鬆入店消費，或許還能認識新朋友。
EN:
The rare craft beer bars in Ximen are located near the intersection of Zhonghua Road and Emei Street. There are diverse exclusive craft beer, including: Hi Beer 5%, Long Island Ice Beer, American IPA, Xiaoman/Winter Gourd Tea Beer, Mangangliu/Patang Liu Fruit beer, spring equinox/plum beer, as well as vodka, piano wine, whiskey and other types of bartender.
The store is clean and tidy. It is located on the streets of the pedestrian area. The atmosphere is leisurely. The service staff has English ability. It can receive foreign tourists.There are carbon roasted restaurants and salty chicken restaurants in the surroundings. There are also soft beverages. When they are tired of shopping in Ximending, they will temporarily rest.
LGBT is friendly, pet -friendly, parent -child friendly, strong abilities in the boss, kind and enthusiastic, like to make friends, even if a person can easily enter the store consumption, maybe you can know new friends.
